title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4240.8 - Franchise loans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4240.8 - Franchise loans

State Regulations

The corporation may provide franchise loans to small
businesses and certified minority and/or women-owned business enterprises that
seek to acquire franchises of nationally-recognized corporations, subject to
sections 4240.4 and
4240.10
of this Part and the
following: (a) disbursements by the
corporation of such loans shall be conditioned on obtaining such franchise(s); and
(b) the amount of any such loan
shall not be less than $50,000 and generally shall not exceed $300,000 or an
amount equal to twice the amount of cash equity in the project, whichever is
less. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4240.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
